私以为CS：CZ是继CS1.6之后该系列的一部里程碑式作品，值得一玩。
没有COD那般宏大的场景，没有R6那般慎密的战术讲求，有的，只有V社经典的设定和情怀。
之所以认为CS：CZ这一作具有里程碑意义，是因为V社将CS：CZ独立出来作为CS的继任者，同时也制作了CS：CZ Delete Scenes用以丰富CS世界的设定。

CS：CZ Delete Scenes是一个单人游戏，[spoiler]当然，任务最终的完成手段依然是经典的拆弹/营救等。[/spoiler]
在不同场景、不同任务中，你就是不同国家/地区的武装力量，来进行若干 [strike]V社[/strike] 各有特色的反恐任务。也许上一幕你还身处日本的狭窄巷道之中，下一幕你就已穿梭于墨西哥的雨林里面。这也正是本作最为重要的卖点——代入感。
相比于前作CS以及多人模式的CS：CZ，Delete Scenes作为单机游戏少了竞技元素，却进一步丰富了V社CS系列作品的世界观与深度。这也是我推荐各位FPS爱好者体验本作的原因。
По моему мнению гемплей очень даже хорош. Не смотря что игра старая, и графика вялая, можно пройти для удовольствия.

Probably the most fun i had playing real life type missions in a game when i was younger and even now. Classic Counter Strike made in to plot based missions. Simple and nice. I like the simple way it is, doesnt need to be fancy. Shooting up terrorists, saving hostages on an international stage. Would have been nice to see this go further with more in these days, but at least we have these missions. Would recommend to all hard core fans who want to play soldier and real life operations based gameplay. Still playing it sometimes when im bored or after a good war movie , just to keep the heart pumping haha.

Cara, esse jogo é notálgico. Quando eu joguei pela primeira vez na LAN-HOUSE, eu disse: - Esse é o melhor jogo de tiro de todos os tempos. Claro que naquela época parecia, hehehe. Enfim, jogá-lo de novo aqui na steam é relembrar uma era de ouro que não volta mais. Para quem quer saber se vale a pena jogar, é o seguinte, ele fica bom na 3ª missão, a "missão da mãe Russia".
O jogo é uma série de missões aleatórias em regiões do mundo, tipo a história das forças especiais de cada mapa do CS e tal.
Every mission is well organised and unique. If you're looking for a story FPS game, this is for you. Came with the original Condition Zero for me.

For what it is, I think it's a great little game to grind out on a rainy weekend when you have nothing else to do. 

The storyline of the game isn't really the most engaging or interesting, it's kind of your standard 'Here's a set of missions leading up to this big momentous event that you need to carry out.' I won't spoil it, but I would personally go into the game to see the progress of CS, the FPS genre and Valve in general. One thing I will say, is that the level design for the game is quite impressive for the time. The immersion of the game is something that I really enjoyed. Some levels make you feel like you're in Saving Private Ryan, others like you're in Indiana Jones, and others like building scene towards the end from The Matrix. The missions that you have to play suit different playstyles quite well too. If you're someone who goes in all-guns-blazing like Rambo, you can do that, but you'll have to rely on your aim and reaction times being quite good. You can play it slow too, peeking corners carefully, and clearing out rooms as though you were destined for a SWAT team. Or if utility is more your thing, then you can take advantage of smokes, flashes, molotovs, and grenades too. As well, some levels have a puzzle-like element to them, where you have to find a way to progress through the stage, whether that's looking for a vent that you have to crawl through, finding a ladder disguised as a pipe, or a specific item that helps you blast open a door. I will admit (shamefully) there were some times where I did have to look at a walkthrough, but I'm a little impatient, and had I spent an extra 5 minutes, I probably would've been fine. Gameplay is identical to that of CS:CZ, with graphics and performance being the same.

No, it's not the best game that Valve has ever made, but I would take the game as more of a learning experience. A product of its time. Yes, the graphics look VERY dated compared to today, and the level design doesn't compare to what we have now, but you have see the game from the eyes of someone from 2004, and you will see a glimpse of appreciation for where we are today. Give the game a try, don't take it too seriously, have fun.
STILL A CLASSIC OF A GAME

想要重温老CS的画面与战斗，又想要电影一般的战斗流程，这一部《零点行动：删减片段》绝对是不二之选。

小时候一直以为CS就网吧里常见的1.5和1.6，没啥剧情的，买了V社大包之后也没去碰，昨晚心血来潮试了一下便感慨相见恨晚，童年错过了这部神作实属遗憾。

PS：零点行动分为两个游戏，一个就叫Condition Zero，是专门PVP的模式，也有单人任务，但也就PVP的地图给你塞AI罢了，而正儿八经的单机剧情，是Condition Zero Deleted Scenes，即零点行动删减片段。

还好删减片段是英文配不是台配，不过没字幕倒是个遗憾。

Malgré un visuel quelque peu vieilli, la campagne "Deleted Scenes" offre à la série des Counter Strike la possibilité de progresser à travers plusieurs missions à la façon d'un Soldier of Fortune (en moins fun). En six heures le mode campagne sera terminé (en facile), sans être trop simple pour autant. En effet, malgré l'omniprésence de kit de soins et de munitions, les ennemis sont plutôt réactifs et il arrive souvent de devoir recommencer une séquence pour revoir l'approche tactique du terrain. Parfois les ordres de missions manquent de clarté et on se retrouve bloqué à certains endroits mais rien n'est insurmontable au final. Les fins de chaque missions sont marquées par une hausse de difficulté, que ce soit par des ennemis mieux armés/isolés, des ultimatum de désamorçage de bombe, des courses à la mort ou de la survie face à plus gros que soi. 

Les doublages francophones du jeu sont assez drôles et très caricaturaux, ce qui crée un contexte pas très sérieux.

Le mode classique solo du jeu a été revu pour ressembler à une espèce de tournoi aux similitudes d'un Unreal Tournament où l'on progresse en remplissant des objectifs sur les maps emblématiques des précédentes versions du jeu, s'entourant des meilleurs coéquipiers bots.

Je n'ai rien à dire sur le multi en ligne, c'est pas vraiment ma came.

( Данный обзор может содержать спойлеры и ненармотивную лексику , если тебе это не по душе , то иди в ж*пу и листай дальше.)
То чувство, когда хотели сделать что-то новое в серии CS и интересное, но из-за времени и конфликтов этот продукт не сыскал популярности. 
Нас ждут разнообразные миссии в разных уголках мира. Где-то мы должны пройти по стелсу, как секретный агент, где-то отсреливаться от гуков, где-то убить наркобарона.
Появились новые предметы, по мимо дефуза. Паяльная лампа, мины, рация, вроде все.
Все сделано с интересом, но есть конкретный минус. Коридор коридорный.
Кто-то жалуется, что в Wolfenstein 2009 сплошной коридор. Поиграйте в это. 
А в последней миссии враги ползут из-за всех щелей. Словно орки в Мории.
Оценка: 6.5/10.

超级好玩的游戏  建议玩

[h1] CS: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes Review [/h1]

CSCZ: DS is probably the only story-based entry in the entirety of the Counter-Strike games, and the singleplayer manages to actually be fairly good. Running on the GoldSrc engine of Half-Life and Counter-Strike 1.6, the game has a bunch of story-oriented missions where you can go around killing terrorists and rescuing hostages in many locations. 

The training area is surprisingly well made also, but I feel that there were a few areas that were a bit buggy at times, and that might just be because it's on a 1997/98 game engine of all things. 

CSCZ DS also has little health/medical cabinets to replace the health chargers that you could find throughout HL1 (if you've played that), and suit charge is replaced with basic ballistic armour. 

The gunplay is pretty good in most of the levels (at least the ones that I have played for myself), but there are a few places where it gets a bit annoying, especially if you lack the appropriate equipment (in one level, I think it was Alamo, there can be a terrorist who continuously throws grenades down the stairs). The melee is also pretty mediocre, especially since this is, once again, a GoldSrc game. That makes the melee more like this: Hit, get to cover, hit, get to cover, repeat until enemy is dead.

Overall, I recommend it if you want a Counter-Strike story mode. It's obviously not up to the graphics or physics standards of CS:GO or CSS, but it mostly makes up for it in the gameplay department.

dope ass game (mar 22 2020)

edit: boring ass game (mar 24 2020)

Already far behind the curve when it came out in 2004, this generic single player military shooter based on Counter-Strike hasn't aged gracefully. For reference this is the same year that saw the release of Half-Life 2, Doom 3, Chronicles of Riddick and Halo 2 and if you're in the mood for some shooting nostalgia you'll be far better of (re)playing any of those games.

Если вы играли в нее ранее и решили поностальгировать, то покупайте и играйте. НО если вы хотите познакомиться с игрой в первые, то не делайте этого. Оно того не стоит: не по материальным соображениям, не по затраченному времени. Вы будете испытывать лишь жжение в пятой точке и красное лицо от facepalm'а, не более.

很明顯的，開發團隊在設計這款遊戲時，已經不能夠滿足當年的玩家了，CS帶來的多人連線風潮與樂趣，完全超過CSCZ單人劇情所能帶來的歡樂，CZ的劇情根本是個敗筆，完全沒有戰慄時空的豐富與多元，也沒有正面交鋒的刺激，論及關卡流暢的程度又比不上關鍵時刻。

如果你想試著了解CZ被刪掉的單人劇情的話，可以看看youture的影片就好。
